course.title: Business Excellence: Consulting, Data Analysis & Product Management
course.description: Master the essential skills of modern business through comprehensive training in consulting methodologies, data-driven decision making, and product management best practices. This integrated course prepares you for leadership roles in today's data-driven business environment.
course.prerequisites: Basic business knowledge, familiarity with Excel or Google Sheets, understanding of business metrics
course.learningObjectives: Master consulting frameworks, develop data analysis skills, learn product management methodologies, integrate cross-functional business strategies

weeks.title: Consulting Fundamentals & Problem-Solving Frameworks
weeks.description: Learn core consulting methodologies, structured problem-solving approaches, and client engagement strategies used by top consulting firms.

weeks.title: Data Analysis & Business Intelligence
weeks.description: Master data collection, analysis techniques, visualization tools, and deriving actionable insights from business data.

weeks.title: Product Management Essentials
weeks.description: Understand product lifecycle management, user research, roadmap planning, and cross-functional team leadership in product development.

weeks.title: Integration & Strategic Implementation
weeks.description: Combine consulting, data analysis, and product management skills to develop comprehensive business strategies and implementation plans.

modules.title: Introduction to Management Consulting
modules.description: Overview of the consulting industry, key players, and the role of consultants in business transformation and strategy development.

modules.title: MECE Framework & Structured Thinking
modules.description: Master the Mutually Exclusive, Collectively Exhaustive framework for breaking down complex business problems into manageable components.

modules.title: Case Study Methodology
modules.description: Learn systematic approaches to analyzing business cases, including hypothesis-driven problem solving and recommendation frameworks.

modules.title: Consulting Case Practice
modules.description: Apply consulting frameworks to real business scenarios and practice structured problem-solving with feedback and evaluation.

modules.title: Data Collection & Sources
modules.description: Identify and evaluate various data sources, learn data collection best practices, and understand data quality assessment techniques.

modules.title: Statistical Analysis for Business
modules.description: Master key statistical concepts, hypothesis testing, correlation analysis, and regression techniques for business decision-making.

modules.title: Data Visualization & Dashboards
modules.description: Create compelling data visualizations, design effective dashboards, and learn to communicate insights through visual storytelling.

modules.title: Business Intelligence Tools
modules.description: Hands-on experience with popular BI tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Excel for creating professional analysis reports.

modules.title: Product Strategy & Vision
modules.description: Develop product strategy, create compelling product visions, and align product goals with business objectives and customer needs.

modules.title: User Research & Customer Discovery
modules.description: Master user research methodologies, conduct customer interviews, analyze user feedback, and translate insights into product requirements.

modules.title: Agile Product Development
modules.description: Understand Agile methodologies, sprint planning, backlog management, and working effectively with development teams.

modules.title: Product Metrics & KPIs
modules.description: Define and track key product metrics, set up analytics frameworks, and use data to measure product success and user engagement.

modules.title: Cross-Functional Strategy Development
modules.description: Integrate consulting frameworks, data insights, and product management principles to create comprehensive business strategies.

modules.title: Final Capstone Project
modules.description: Apply all learned skills to solve a complex business challenge using consulting methods, data analysis, and product management approaches.
